description: HTML source code for a web-based database viewer interface, including styles and client-side JavaScript for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables in a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates individual table cell HTML, handling objects and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects.
